component.name: ImHex
component.summary: A hex editor for reverse engineers and programmers

description.p: ImHex is a modern Hex Editor for Reverse Engineers, Developers, Malware Analysists and Hackers who value their retinas when working at 3 AM again.

ul.li: Custom C++-like pattern language for parsing and highlighting a file's content
Data inspector allowing interpretation of data as many different types
Huge file support with fast and efficient loading
Disassembler supporting many different architectures: ARM, x86, PowerPC, MIPS, and more
Helpful tools such as an Itanium and MSVC demangler, ASCII table, Regex replacer, mathematical expression evaluator (calculator), hexadecimal color picker and many more
Doesn't burn out your retinas when used in late-night sessions

screenshot.caption: Managing bookmarks, disassembling machine code and decrypting AES excrypted data on the fly
Using a pattern to parse and highlight different sections of a PE executable file
